title: FULSE LINK - HACK ACCS
body:
**Guys there a person who is sending links to everyone with message 
the message is as follows**: 

do you want 3 skins free ?
 login to get 3 skins free.

then there is a link  which takes to a fake lol website 
where you have to login and put your username and password.

to avoid it you if you used the link change your password.

becareful guys!!!

replies.body: Please be cautious of any links being sent to you through those messages! [**Here's some general steps you can take**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204230720) to keep yourself protected!
